pages.text: The Blade of the Ninja who serves the Divine Heir.$(br2)It is entrusted the wish "Even the Ninja destined to kill, should not abandon his kindness and sympathy which is only a bit left."$(br)He killed my fellows with the Blade... And he carried a crimson Tachi behind him.

The Second Cycle of Lunar Calendar, The year of Sun, Spring and Fire. Tomihara State was pulled down.$(br2)The Divine Heir and his retainer Ninja, broke into the Mysterious Mountain.$(br)I witnessed the power of the crimson Tachi, so-called the Immortal Blade, and the extreme toughness of Kusabimaru, with my own eyes.

However, the real fear came from the Immortal Power of the Divine Heir, while the Power of Kill the Immortal, was also held by himself...$(br2)The Divine Heir was eventually forced to leave. It is not until they broke in were we Youkai, living in the Mountain, aware of the threat from human beings.

The Second Cycle of Lunar Calendar, The year of Star, Winter and Water. Some Youkai travelled to the former Tomihara, and saw the prosperity of their smithing industry.$(br2)I travelled there with another group of my fellow in the following year, to learn smithing from human beings.
